actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to terminate the authorizations for Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, and Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, in the State of Indiana.

summary.text: Terminates the authorization for the Lafayette Dam and Reservoir and the Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, on the Wabash River, Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authorizations for Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, and Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, in the State of Indiana.
